title: mute scrollback (the irc viewer)
body:
scrollback makes annoying noise. 

Please add function to mute its sound or let user disable this feature.

title: Tag-based project URI
body:
e.g. http://hack.g0v.tw/project/3du should list all projects under the 3du organization.

目前 hack.g0v.tw/project 的「<專案> 隸屬 <分類>」 有兩個鏈結但點選無作用。

title: http://hack.g0v.tw/people 的關鍵字有很多重複，可以整合起來嗎?
body:
大家好，想回報一個問題。
因為在下新手上路，所以剛剛跑去 http://hack.g0v.tw/people 註冊資料 
然後發現，
那些關鍵字好像有很多是重複的，只是大小寫不同而已
這些有辦法整合起來嗎? 

整理了一下
大概有這些 (後面的數字是目前加入人數)

--------------------------------------
Android 47
android 13
AngularJS  3
angularjs 10
ASP  2
ASP.NET  5
c  7
C 33
c#  7
C# 31
c++  8
C++ 19
C/C++ 33
c/c++ 35
database  9
Database 10
git  5
Git  9
Java 36
java 56
JavaScript 10
javascript 90
Javascript 13
linux 47
Linux 20
matlab  8
Matlab  3
MySQL 31
mysql  5
object-c  4
Objective-C  5
objective-c 16
open data  2
opendata 16
programer  4
programmer 36
python 70
Python 21
Ruby 12
ruby  9
Ruby on Rails  6
ubuntu 25
Ubuntu  6
vim 35
Vim 13
Web  8
web 47
醫學 10
醫療  3

程式 50  ==> 可以算進 programmer 嗎?

(完全沒有名稱)  23

--------------------------------------

以下是小小建議：
1. 由於user可以自建關鍵字，這種大小寫造成的問題可能以後還會再發生，建議新增關鍵字功能可能要加個過濾機制，避免日後的困擾
2. 目前關鍵字是以加入人數多寡作為排序依據，這樣其實不太方便找尋所屬的關鍵字，建議是否可以改成以名稱排序? 免得有人熊熊找不到就自己再創一個，搞不好單字還打錯...  Orz

title: external subfoldr routing
body: the existing //:hackId/:docId doesn't work, because docId might not exist until :folder is loaded.  Need to do something like //:hackId/:folderId/:docId in routing

title: tag filtering in custom index page
body: the page described in #43 should allow filtering by tag to show matched items

title: displayed "contributors" as "coordinator"
body:
For example, compare the search result of "moedict-data" at http://hack.g0v.tw/project
and the content of
https://github.com/g0v/moedict-data/blob/master/g0v.json

title: 把 g0v 的 pads 從 hackpad.com 搬到 g0v.hackpad.com
body:
有些比較早的 pad 還放在 hackpad.com 上, 應該搬來 g0v.hackpad.com
搬過來的好處:
- 比較容易 search
- 方便備份

搬的步驟
1. 先在 g0v.hackpad.com 上 search 一下是不是重複了, 若是的話把舊的砍掉
2. 在 g0v.hackpad.com 上用一樣的 title 建立一個新 pad
3. 全選、copy、paste
4. 把舊的 pad 的內文全刪, 留下一行 link 說搬到新的地方
5. 比較麻煩的是原本文章中有 link 到其他 pad, 要修一下. (不過因為有 step 4, 可以之後慢慢修)

title: project registry - improve error message and add successfully added message
body:
* g0v.json error fails silently (in js console only)
* after adding g0v.json there's no message indicating that it is already in the list.

title: hackfoldr: add a help icon next to home
body:
the helpful info is in "about", which is unclear to people who wonder about how to edit index / add entries.

add an help icon next to home and tell the user to look at "about", before we get some proper ui tour

title: karma tests for signup
body:
we should at least test user signup and set username

Notes: for building testable version we should use separate firebase db:

    FIREBASE=https://g0v-test.firebaseio.com/ ./node_modules/.bin/brunch buiild

title: ask projects to add g0v.json
body:
Spam every projects by creating bugs on their issue tracker.

This is the bug template:
```
If this project does not belong to http://g0v.tw/ or is not applicable, 
you can ignore and close this bug.

Otherwise please add g0v.json to your project.
See https://g0v.hackpad.com/g0v.json-spec-c07sSfauWSc for detail.

You can see the progress of adding g0v.json here: g0v/hack.g0v.tw#35
```

title: improve ajax spinner
body:
the current implementation leavers the spinner if the project filter yields empty result.

possibly useful: https://github.com/benlau/bnloadingpromise

title: hackpad collection as hackfoldr submenu
body:
如果放collection lin在左側（如公報）
變成可展開submenu

title: project registry redesign - show subprojects aggregated by primary project
body: for example the meta project has meta & hack.g0v.tw, kuansim has -frontend and -backend.  we should have an aggregated view instead of a mundane list

people registration: unable to unlink facebook account
增加編輯 people contact 資訊
body:

但需要找人時層層關卡，連去github, twitter, fb可能沒email
希望也能增加email登錄

title: split profile page from people page
body: also perhaps display avatar in navbar to indicate login state

title: 在專案列表右欄下面列出所有 g0v 專案的 github issues
body:
在專案列表右欄加一個 widget (section)，列出目前所有 g0v 專案的 github issues，並可以依據專案、tag 過濾(filter)，方便大家跳坑。

* 可預設只列出 bit-sized issues
* 專案名稱一樣以 tag 形式呈現，但顏色不同

title: tag discussion under avatar list
body: tag discussion is so much fun, would like to reach it within two clicks. would be nice if it's moved to avatar list page.

title: HUB profile picture changing
body: It'll be preferable if users can change their profile pictures in HUB, e.g. from Facebook profile picture to Twitter's, or upload another.

title: mobile safari main-content scrollbar not visible
body: go to hack.g0v.tw, the content area should have a vertical scrollbar (there's overflow-y: auto) but it doesn't.  works fine on normal webkit.
